objective.#text: Explain/identify the differences between grading and feedback.
Explain why feedback is important in student learning.
Analyze sample feedback in terms of its effectiveness for learning
Deliver constructive, prioritized, actionable feedback on student work
Describe the pros and cons of feedback timing and frequency for learning
Use a rubric to practice valid (accurate; meets the target) and reliable (interrater reliability) grading
Create and refine a simple rubric for grading a quantitative problem or short answer
Explain the application of different strategies for efficient, reliable, valid grading and feedback
Employ different strategies for efficient, reliable, valid grading and feedback
